caption.p: The metabolic pathway of sanguinarine and chelerythrine. 6OMT, norcoclaurine 6′- O-methyltransferase; CNMT, coclaurine- N-methyltransferase; NMCH, N-methylcoclaurine hydroxylase; 4OMT, 4′- O-methyltransferase; BBE, berberine bridge enzyme; CFS, cheilanthifoline synthase; SPS, stylopine synthase; TNMT, tetrahydroprotoberberine cis- N-methyltransferase; MSH, ( S)-cis- N-methylstylopine 14′-hydroxylase, P6H, protopine 6′-hydroxylase; DBOX, dihydrobenzophenanthridine oxidase; TDC, ( S)-canadine synthase; SMT, ( S)-scoulerine 9′- O-methyltransferase.
